def give_sum(arr):
    sum_value = 0
    o = 0
    while o < len(arr):
        sum_value += arr[o]
        o += 1
    return sum_value

def give_sum(arr):
    sum_value = 0
    o = len(arr)
    while o > 0:
        o -= 1
        sum_value += arr[o]
    return sum_value
